div.span: Hey, you hear about this new "bitcoin" thing?

span.style: color: #0067ce; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold;
color: #ff0300; font-family: Comic Sans MS; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold;

div.span: Oh it's like virtual money you can use to buy stuff

span.style: color: #0067ce; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold;

div.span: Oh. Well that sounds stupid lol

span.style: color: #ff0300; font-family: Comic Sans MS; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: bold;
